translations: vi.戏剧化；可改编成剧本（等于 dramatize）
vt.把……戏剧化；生动地表达（等于 dramatize）

sentences.sentence: It is unhealthy to dramatise life.
sentences.translation: 生活的戏剧化是不健康的。

sentences.sentence: But I also do not want to dramatise things.
sentences.translation: 但我也不想多说些什么让事情复杂化。

sentences.sentence: Remember to dramatise these facts when you include them in your screenplay.
sentences.translation: 记住你要将这些事实戏剧性的编织在你的剧本里。
